description: Delicious vegan bolognese, a classic the whole family will love.
keywords: Bolognese,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Mushroom,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Sweet potato,Kale,Quick & easy lunch,Low fat
name: 15-Minute Vegan Lentil Bolognese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 840g no added salt lentils, drained and rinsed
1 cup kale, finely shredded (or spinach or beetroot leaves)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large frying pan over medium heat and put the kettle on.
Add the olive oil, carrot, garlic, oregano and tomatoes to pan. Bring to the boil and simmer for 3 minutes.
Remove tomato mixture from heat and place in a blender. pur√©e then return to the pan and heat over medium. Add lentils and mushrooms. Simmer for a further 5 minutes.
Prepare the sweet potato spaghetti as per packet instructions.
Place whole grain noodles into a bowl, pour over boiling water and sit for 2 minutes.
Mix sweet potato spaghetti with whole grain noodles, top with sauce and garnish with shredded leaves.
